summary:
"The Revenant" is a 2015 American Western film about a frontiersman named Hugh Glass, directed by Alejandro G. Iñárritu. Based on a 2002 novel and an earlier poem, it stars Leonardo DiCaprio and Tom Hardy. The movie follows Glass's survival story in 1823 after being attacked by a bear and betrayed by his teammates.

Filming began in 2014 and faced several delays. The movie was a big success, making over $533 million worldwide. It received many awards, including three Golden Globes and five BAFTAs, plus three Oscars for Best Director, Best Actor (DiCaprio), and Best Cinematography.
title: The Revenant (2015 film)
